## Discussion

You’re required to provide a [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/Place] object, either by passing it as the first argument or setting [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/AnnotationConstructorOptions/place]. # new PlaceAnnotation(coordinate, options)

**Constructor**

Creates a new place annotation.

## Declaration

```swift
constructor(
        coordinate: Coordinate | Place | SearchAutocompleteResult,
        options?: MarkerAnnotationConstructorOptions,
    );
```

## Discussion

You’re required to provide a [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/Place] object, either by passing it as the first argument or setting [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/AnnotationConstructorOptions/place]. If you don’t provide the required object, the call throws an error.
title: new PlaceAnnotation(coordinate, options)
